projects.heading: NFT Generator App
items: Frontend built using HTML and CSS.
Backend built using Node.js and Express.
Image processing performed using JIMP npm package.
Deployed using Heroku.

projects.heading: Happiness Valley Website
items: Frontend built using HTML and CSS.
Backend built using Node.js and Express.
JSON objects with Handlebars helpers are used to scale page.
Deployed using Heroku.
